subject: One my first conversion boxes.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
AM/FM/Cassette/CD boom box. With an added board for linear, random and
manual sweep, built 9/2008. It was sweeping out of band on FM, so I added a
control to set the sweep limits on the back panel, and a linear rate control
on the side.

 F-S
